description_html:
The legendary Marcel Wanders has partnered with powerhouse architectural metal design studio PURE + FREEFORM to release The Chameleon Collection, a series of eight new metal exterior finishes that represent a new vision for the future of architecturally expressive exteriors. The collection explores how building facades can transform through changes in light, reflection, vantage point and movement.

The collection is comprised of four types of skins: Sensitive, Dynamic, Romantic and Luxurious. Designed with organic forms, the Romantic Skins are based on lacy patterns and graceful details. Accented by feminine colors, these skins emit a pearlescent shine that transforms throughout the day. Luxurious Skins offer a sophisticated opulence anchored in a palette of black matte and gold. With exquisite detail, they allow a building's exterior to stand out and make a bold statement. The Dynamic Skins use edgy, geometric forms and masculine colors to create high-contrast designs that result in the creation of abstract details and gives a building’s exterior an energizing effect. Delicate details and soft tones are the essence of the Sensitive Skin, with shimmering lights blending with open shapes, to portray a fragile, yet inviting, ambiance.
